li.label: Heavy Platform
li.description: While a larger frame gives {PAWN_nameDef} superior defense and computing power, [PAWN_pronoun] moves slower due to extra bulk.

li.label: Reinforced structure
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is able to withstand a lot more punishment than the average geth.

li.label: Networked AI
li.description: All geth are linked to this neural network, "sharing" their processing power, distributing low-level processes like motor control and visual identification to free up bandwidth for higher reasoning and complex thought.

li.label: Enhanced leg actuators
li.description: Enhanced leg actuators allow {PAWN_nameDef} to move faster than average.

li.label: Enhanced perception
li.description: Equipped with advanced perception systems, {PAWN_nameDef} is able to fire more accurately.

li.label: Evasive
li.description: A type of perception system allows {PAWN_nameDef} to simulate and dodge would-be blows before they even hit.
